hero.subtitle: The modern and complete solution to digitize your health center management, accessible everywhere, even without internet connection.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: A complete platform to improve the quality of your care

patientManagement.title: Patient Management
patientManagement.description: Complete electronic medical records with detailed history, photos and personalized tracking for each patient.

consultations.title: Medical Consultations
consultations.description: Quickly record consultations with diagnoses, prescriptions and automated appointment tracking.

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.description: Continue working without internet connection. Your data syncs automatically as soon as you're online.

stats.title: They trust us
stats.subtitle: Join hundreds of health centers using Santé Rurale

forProfessionals.title: Designed by caregivers, for caregivers
forProfessionals.subtitle: A solution designed to meet the specific needs of rural health centers in Africa.

saveTime.title: Save time
saveTime.description: Intuitive and fast interface, designed to maximize your daily efficiency.

reliableData.title: Reliable data
reliableData.description: Centralize all your medical information in a secure and always accessible system.

workOffline.title: Work anywhere
workOffline.description: No internet dependency. Perfect for areas with limited connectivity.

security.title: Your data is secure
security.subtitle: We take the confidentiality of your medical data very seriously. All your information is protected.

encryption.title: AES-256 Encryption
encryption.description: All your data is encrypted end-to-end with military-grade standards.

isolation.title: Total isolation
isolation.description: Each center has its own database. Your data is never shared.

compliance.title: GDPR Compliance
compliance.description: Full compliance with European and African data protection regulations.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your health center?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of centers that trust Santé Rurale.

footer.description: The modern solution for managing rural health centers in Africa. Accessible, reliable and secure.

cookies.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site, analyze traffic and personalize content. By continuing to browse, you accept our use of cookies.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the site to function. They allow navigation and access to secure areas.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.description: Allow us to remember your preferences (language, display settings) to improve your experience.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use the site to improve it (pages visited, loading time).

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: Used to offer you relevant content and advertisements based on your interests.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Rural Health ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and African data protection regulations.

personal.title: Personal data
items: Last name, first name, email address

purpose.title: Processing purposes
items: Medical records management and patient follow-up
Statistical reports generation and DHIS2 exports

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All communications are encrypted via HTTPS/TLS. Sensitive data is encrypted at rest.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Secure JWT authentication with short-lived tokens and refresh tokens.

isolation.title: Isolation
isolation.description: Multi-tenant architecture with complete data isolation between health facilities.

backups.title: Backups
backups.description: Automatic daily backups with secure retention.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.text: Personal data is retained for the duration of your use of the service, then 5 years after the last activity, in accordance with legal obligations for medical data retention. You can request deletion of your data at any time (see "Your rights").

rights.title: Your GDPR rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR and African regulations, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of access
access.description: Obtain a copy of your personal data

portability.title: Right to portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format

erasure.title: Right to erasure
erasure.description: Request the deletion of your personal data

rights.exerciseRights: To exercise these rights, go to your profile or contact us at privacy@santerurale.io

cookies.title: Use of cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our service. For more information about the types of cookies used and how to manage your preferences, see our cookie banner.
cookies.essential: Essential cookies: Necessary for operation (authentication, security)
cookies.functional: Functional cookies: Remember your preferences (language, settings)
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us improve the service (with your consent)

contact.title: Contact us
contact.text: For any questions about this privacy policy or your personal data, contact our Data Protection Officer:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using the Rural Health platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Rural Health.

description.title: Service description
description.text: Rural Health is a progressive web application (PWA) for health management designed for health centers in rural areas. The service includes:

eligibility.title: Eligibility conditions
eligibility.text: Use of Rural Health is reserved for duly authorized health professionals and accredited health facilities. By creating an account, you certify:
items: Being authorized to access patient medical data
Acting within the scope of your professional duties
Respecting medical confidentiality and codes of ethics

accountSecurity.title: Account security
accountSecurity.text: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials. You must use a strong password and never share it. All activity under your account is your responsibility.

properUse.title: Proper use
properUse.text: You agree to use the service in accordance with applicable laws, health regulations and good medical practices. Access to data must be limited to what is strictly necessary.

accuracy.title: Information accuracy
accuracy.text: You guarantee that the information you enter is accurate, complete and up to date. Errors must be corrected as soon as possible.

prohibited.title: Prohibited uses
items: Access patient data without legitimate authorization
Share your credentials with third parties
Use the service for unauthorized commercial purposes

data.title: Data and privacy
data.text: The processing of your personal data and health data is governed by our
data.textEnd: . By using the service, you consent to this processing in accordance with GDPR and local regulations.

availability.title: Service availability
availability.text: We strive to maintain the service available 24/7. However, interruptions may occur for maintenance or force majeure. Offline mode allows you to continue working even in case of temporary unavailability.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.text: Rural Health provides a management tool. Medical decisions remain the exclusive responsibility of health professionals. We cannot be held responsible for the consequences of medical decisions made based on information recorded in the system. The service is provided "as is" without warranty of fitness for a particular purpose.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: You can terminate your account at any time from your profile settings. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access in case of violation of these terms, without notice. In case of termination, you retain the right to export your data in accordance with GDPR.

modifications.title: Modifications to terms
modifications.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will be notified by email or via the application. Your continued use of the service after notification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: Governing law
law.text: These terms are governed by Malian law and European GDPR for aspects related to data protection. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts of Bamako, Mali.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions about these terms:
